import { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FiX } from 'react-icons/fi'; import Button from './reusable/Button'; const HireMeModal = ({ onClose, onRequest }) => { const [flashMessage, setFlashMessage] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add your logic here for handling the form submission setFlashMessage(true); setTimeout(() => setFlashMessage(false), 3000); // Hides the message after 3 seconds }; return ( {/* Modal Backdrop */}

}

); }; export default HireMeModal;
